front.title: Network signaling for IPv4/IPv6 protocol selection for end-systems

abstract.t: Within an administrative realm, especially during an IPv6implementation period, the network operator has interest to havecontrol on the IP protocol version (IPv4 or IPv6) used by the endsystems and network devices. This document provides a problemstatement about both protocol preference and protocol selection manynetwork operators face when implementing IPv6 in a controlledprocess.
